attributes.action: Gordon Brown to Publicy Distance himself from Jack Straw
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Jack Straw has suggested Women should not go to Prison.  This is because Women are different from Men - According to Jack Straw.  This is a disgusting distortion of the truth - Women and Men can bring about exactly the same Evils - And should be treated in exactly the same way - Contempt and prison if it is deserved.  Just because women have children does not mean women are nicer, less responsible then men or do not perform the same crimes.  We all know that’s rubbish the same as the rubbish spouted for years women do not abuse children - This Idea MUST BE Stopped!

rejection.details: This petition does not request a tangible response from the Prime Minister. If you wish to re-submit your petition, please request a more specific action.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
